summary.span: Represents a collection of objects that collectively make up the geometry of a .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that collectively make up the geometry of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如前所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全所述但， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件衍生自，使用時，將它們複製。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，更新版本中，您可能會無法擷取或移除您加入至集合以原始物件。Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object. 集合中是原始檔案的副本會被視為不同比您所加入。The in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added. 此實作會擲回如果您嘗試新增**null** (**Nothing**) 參考。This implementation throws an if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合會向前復原開始的第一個搜尋和結束時間，最後。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例的值。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 也就是說，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*等於。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to .
